summary: This is an email from defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim to prosecutors Christian Everdell and Mark Cohen, regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's case number 02879-509. It appears to be legal correspondence between defense and prosecution teams.

persons.context: Recipient of the email, part of the prosecution team.

persons.context: Recipient of the email, part of the prosecution team.

events.title: Legal Correspondence Regarding Maxwell Case
events.description: Defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim sends email to prosecutors Christian Everdell and Mark Cohen regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's case.

keyFacts: The document is an email from defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim to prosecutors Christian Everdell and Mark Cohen.
The subject is Ghislaine Maxwell's case, referenced by number 02879-509.
The correspondence demonstrates ongoing legal communication between defense and prosecution teams in late December 2020.
The email shows the professional legal teams involved in Maxwell's prosecution at that time.
